content:
Multiple major releases today :octopus:

  • Roc alpha4
  • basic-cli 0.20
  • basic-webserver 0.13

Alpha4 mainly fixes a bunch of bugs :ladybug:
The basic platforms got nicer APIs, way more test coverage, extra functionality, and improved examples :star:

Upgrading should be pretty easy. Only if you use Cmd will you need to make some changes, see "Cmd Upgrade Guide" at the bottom of the release notes.

All combined, a significant upgrade in the Roc user experience, enjoy :yum:
Roc alpha4 is now also available on nix (unstable channel), only on linux x64 for now.
